article:
Mary was ill, so she went to see  the doctor .
"Doctor, I'm not feeling  _ ," said Mary, " Every time I do homework, I feel  _ . If I go to school on foot, I have to sit down and  have a rest  for a few times."
The doctor looked over her  _ . At last he said, "  _  serious, but I'm afraid you are eating too much."
" I don't understand. What do you mean? " asked Mary.
" I mean you eat  too much  food, " said the doctor.
" Oh! You mean I'm too  _ . That's a problem," said Mary, "What should I do?"
" The answer is easy," said the doctor, " If you want to be thinner and healthier, you  _  eat a lot of food and you should also do much  _ .
